name: Adobe-Marketing-Cloud-Mobile-Services
summary: Native Mobile SDKs, dev tools and example apps.
description: iOS SDK 4.x for Marketing Cloud Solutions lets you measure native Apple iPhone and iPad applications, deliver targeted content within your app, and leverage and collect audience data through audience management.
